entry.title: Jimmyh-world/Cardano-explorer: A lightweight, vanilla JavaScript block explorer for the Cardano blockchain using the Blockfrost API. This project demonstrates building a secure client-server application with real-time blockchain data display.
entry.content: A lightweight, vanilla JavaScript block explorer for the Cardano blockchain using the Blockfrost API. This project demonstrates building a secure client-server application with real-time blockchain data display.

entry.title: hy0ug0/strava-heatmap-proxy: A lightweight proxy server built with Deno to relay requests to the Strava heatmap tile service.
entry.content: A lightweight proxy server built with Deno to relay requests to the Strava heatmap tile service.

entry.title: asilvafx/vite-react-boilerplate: A lightweight, production-ready boilerplate for React projects built on Vite. This setup includes essential dependencies for modern web development, such as Axios for API requests, i18n for internationalization, and React Router for route management. Includes Tailwind CSS for styling, ESLint for code quality, and support for environment variables.
entry.content: A lightweight, production-ready boilerplate for React projects built on Vite. This setup includes essential dependencies for modern web development, such as Axios for API requests, i18n for internationalization, and React Router for route management. Includes Tailwind CSS for styling, ESLint for code quality, and support for environment variables.

entry.title: dominikj111/call-to-promise: A lightweight, production-ready, universal library for transforming callback-style functions into Promise-based ones. Works seamlessly across Node.js, Deno, and browsers.
entry.content: A lightweight, production-ready, universal library for transforming callback-style functions into Promise-based ones. Works seamlessly across Node.js, Deno, and browsers.

entry.title: wangenius/ghostie: A convenient and lightweight desktop AI tool
entry.content: A convenient and lightweight desktop AI tool

entry.title: Christopher-Totlyakov/OnlineMovieAPI: What we created with Cloudflare Worker is a Serverless Function running on Cloudflare's edge network. It acts as a lightweight API proxy that processes requests from the React app, fetches data from the OMDb API, and returns the response. This approach enhances security by hiding the API key and improves performance.
entry.content: What we created with Cloudflare Worker is a Serverless Function running on Cloudflare's edge network. It acts as a lightweight API proxy that processes requests from the React app, fetches data from the OMDb API, and returns the response. This approach enhances security by hiding the API key and improves performance.

entry.title: klinecharts/KLineChart: 📈Lightweight k-line chart that can be highly customized. Zero dependencies. Support mobile.（可高度自定义的轻量级k线图，无第三方依赖，支持移动端）
